title: Service Quality Competency Enhancement: Web-Based Learning Strategies for Transitioning to Online Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing practice experience and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can master 80% or more of nursing theory using web-based tools (quiz platforms, video lectures).
Learners can assess and improve practical case analysis and critical thinking skills through weekly journal writing.
Learners can perform peer assessments and feedback activities at least 70% of the time on a smartphone-accessible collaborative learning platform (bulletin board, real-time chat).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
